name: Pineapple Skunk
description: Pineapple Skunk by Humbolt Seeds is a hybrid cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese. This fragrant plant offers a sweet, pineapple aroma with strong, physical effects. Known for its couch lock potential, Pineapple Skunk is optimal for relieving stress, insomnia, and pain and is best experienced during inactive hours. Indoor or outdoor grows are viable options for beginning and veteran growers alike, with higher yields indoors flowering around 8 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Pineapple Skunk by Humbolt Seeds is a hybrid cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese. This fragrant plant offers a sweet, pineapple aroma with strong, physical effects. Known for its couch lock potential, Pineapple Skunk is optimal for relieving stress, insomnia, and pain and is best experienced during inactive hours. Indoor or outdoor grows are viable options for beginning and veteran growers alike, with higher yields indoors flowering around 8 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text:
This hit me hard within the first 15 minutes, I only needed a little. Which was surprising compared to most of the other strains I do. I usually take about 30-40 hits in order to become fully medicated.  I tend to have the opposite effects, where a Sativa would give you Energy, it would put me to sleep. Indica's give me energy and I am able to function better than normal like a well oiled machine. It's great for pain and if you tend get a lot done today, and have the opposing effects like I do then I recommend this strain.
------- 
Cliff Notes
Before: Pain was 8/10, stress was a 9/10, ADHD 6/10
After: Pain 3/10 stress 1/10, ADHD 0/10

this is a very good strain, i’m pretty naked lmao 
depression before smoking: 7/10
anxiety before smoking: 10/10
depression after: 2
anxiety after:4

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Strawberry Blue, Blackberry Haze, Sugar Punch, Pineapple Skunk, and Hardcore OG
articles.author: Anna Wilcox
articles.text:
Summer may be over, but that doesn't mean an end to fun and fruity summertime flavors. This week's strain alert is packed with some extra tasty treats. From Strawberry Blue to Sugar Punch, these gems all feature incredibly unique and full-bodied aromas, perfect for sneaking in one last taste of those fresh summer flavors. 
Visit the Leafly strain Explorer to write a review or find one of these delicious buds near you!
1. Strawberry Blue
Characteristics of Strawberry Blue:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Strawberry and New Blue
Bred by World of Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Delivers head-heavy, cerebral effects
Indoor and outdoor flowering time of 9 weeks

2. Blackberry Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Bred by Nebu Hybridz
Sweet, berry aroma with hints of violet, spice, and cocoa
Brings focused and energetic effects

3. Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Slightly sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross of Super Silver Haze and The One
Bred by Sannie Seeds
Berry and lemon aroma
Has dreamy, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 9-10 weeks

4. Pineapple Skunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Skunk:

Hybrid with slightly indica-dominant effects
Cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese
Bred by Humboldt Seeds
Sweet, pineapple aroma
Delivers mellow, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks 

5. Hardcore OG
Characteristics of Hardcore OG: 

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry
California-based genetics
Pungent aroma
Brings soothing, sedative effects
High THC

growInfo.growNotes: Yields are expected at approximately 500 grams per square meter
